title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - The Zero Migration Path from Data to Enterprise Agentic AI (AIM123)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从数据到企业代理 AI 的零迁移路径 (AIM123)
abstract: Enterprise AI adoption faces significant barriers, with traditional approaches requiring long deployment cycles and achieving only 30% success rates. The primary bottleneck stems from data migration requirements that have high cost and time implications. This talk explores an alternative paradigm: federated intelligence architectures that eliminate data migration through connectivity and processing. We examine how federated data foundations, data marketplaces, conversational business intelligence, and pre-built agentic frameworks can reduce AI deployment timelines from years to weeks while maintaining security and governance. The session presents practical blueprints and implementation strategies for accelerating enterprise AI adoption. This presentation is brought to you by Trianz I Concierto, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 企业 AI 采用面临重大障碍，传统方法需要漫长的部署周期，成功率仅为 30%。主要瓶颈源于数据迁移需求，这带来了高成本和时间影响。本次演讲探讨了一种替代范式：联邦智能架构，通过连接和处理消除数据迁移。我们研究联邦数据基础、数据市场、对话式商业智能和预构建代理框架如何将 AI 部署时间从数年缩短至数周，同时保持安全性和治理。会议展示了加速企业 AI 采用的实用蓝图和实施策略。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 Trianz I Concierto 提供。
